data.comment: The match is underway at Allianz Stadium.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Juventus.
Marco Piccinini awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Juventus.
Free kick in a good position for Juventus!
Lorenzo Tonelli (Sampdoria) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 5, Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Juventus's Danilo breaks free at Allianz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Marco Piccinini awards Sampdoria a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Juventus.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Goal kick for Sampdoria at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 10, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
In the minute 12, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dejan Kulusevski is on target to give Juventus a 1-0 advantage.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Sampdoria in the half of Juventus.
Sampdoria are in shooting range from this free kick.
Juan Cuadrado for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 19, Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Sampdoria.
Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
In the minute 22, Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
Marco Piccinini blows against Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo for offside.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Jakub Jankto (Sampdoria) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sampdoria drive forward but Jakub Jankto is judged offside.
In the minute 29, In Turin Sampdoria's Federico Bonazzoli is caught offside.
Marco Piccinini signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Juventus's half.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Federico Bonazzoli of Sampdoria gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
In the minute 32, Marco Piccinini signals a throw-in for Juventus, close to Sampdoria's area.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Sampdoria territory.
Juventus are pushing forward but Cristiano Ronaldo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Throw-in for Juventus close to the penalty box.
Marco Piccinini signals a Juventus throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
In the minute 38, Can Juventus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sampdoria's half?
Throw-in for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 43, Juventus's Weston McKennie gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Sampdoria are coming forward and Fabio Depaoli gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Allianz Stadium.
The second-half has started.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Sampdoria make their first substitution with Gaston Ramirez replacing Fabio Depaoli.
In the minute 46, Fabio Quagliarella is replacing Mehdi Leris for the away team.
Claudio Ranieri is making the team's third substitution at Allianz Stadium with Maya Yoshida replacing Lorenzo Tonelli.
In the minute 48, Gianluca Frabotta gets his shot on target but fails to score for Juventus.
Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Juventus.
Juventus needs to be cautious. Sampdoria have an attacking throw-in.
Federico Bonazzoli for Sampdoria gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez misses with an attempt on goal.
Marco Piccinini awards Juventus a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Juventus's Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Sampdoria in their own half.
In the minute 54, Gianluca Frabotta (Juventus) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Sampdoria have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Turin.
Sampdoria have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 58, Important block from the Juventus defence as Bartosz Bereszynski fires in a strike for Sampdoria.
Morten Thorsby (Sampdoria) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 59, In Turin Juventus attack through Cristiano Ronaldo. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sampdoria's half?
Throw-in Sampdoria.
In Turin Sampdoria attack through Fabio Quagliarella. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 66, Marco Piccinini awards Juventus a goal kick.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Andrea Pirlo (Juventus) is making a first substitution, with Mattia De Sciglio replacing Gianluca Frabotta.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Turin.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In the minute 69, Sampdoria attack but Morten Thorsby's header doesn't find the target.
Juventus have a goal kick.
The away team replace Federico Bonazzoli with Valerio Verre.
In the minute 70, Mikkel Damsgaard is on a sub for Morten Thorsby for Sampdoria.
In Turin, Mattia De Sciglio of Juventus is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Sampdoria at Allianz Stadium.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Cristiano Ronaldo's header is off-target for Juventus.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Free kick Juventus.
In Turin Juventus drive forward through Cristiano Ronaldo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 76, Can Sampdoria capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Sampdoria push forward at Allianz Stadium and Fabio Quagliarella gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Juventus defence.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Goal! Leonardo Bonucci extends Juventus's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 78, Rodrigo Bentancur is replacing Juan Cuadrado for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Fabio Quagliarella for Sampdoria drives towards goal at Allianz Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
The home team have replaced Dejan Kulusevski with Douglas Costa. This is the third substitution made today by Andrea Pirlo.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 85, Andrea Pirlo (Juventus) is making a fourth substitution, with Merih Demiral replacing Giorgio Chiellini.
Sampdoria are coming forward and Fabio Quagliarella gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 87, Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Goal! Juventus extend their lead to 3-0 through Cristiano Ronaldo.
Aaron Ramsey instrumental with a fine assist.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Juventus's Weston McKennie is whistled for offside at Allianz Stadium.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Marco Piccinini blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
